snippet.title: Dingo Pictures' Atlantis: The Lost Continent (Remaster)
snippet.description:
It's been awhile since I uploaded here, considering I've moved to my other channel, GokaiOrange, for all my current uploads, but I figured I'd post this here.

This is Dingo's take on Disney's Atlantis, released in 2001, which happens to be their penultimate film and the most recent film chronologically to be given an English dub.

It's also arguably their most technologically advanced film outside of their final film, with more fluid animation, an increase in digital backgrounds and has some pretty good music to back it up. It's still a Dingo film, but it's arguably one of their better films.

This version is a Phelous-style edited cut. I took the English audio from the PS2 release and synced it up over the original German version, with the opening titles and credits added as well. I also cropped out most of the garbage areas to make it look a bit more professional.

I do this so there can be a clearer version of the English dub due to the PS2 version being a bit blurry and due to the English DVD not being uploaded to YouTube in its entirety.
